mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_reserve( user_id, screen_no, reserve_no, seat_no, schedule_no, movie_no) VALUES( #{user_id},#{screen_no},seq_reserve_no.nextval,#{seat_no},#{schedule_no},#{movie_no} )
mapper.update: UPDATE m_movie SET movie_count = movie_count + 1 WHERE movie_no = #{movie_no}
mapper.select: SELECT se.seat_name FROM m_reserve res JOIN m_seat se ON res.seat_no = se.seat_no WHERE res.schedule_no = #{schedule_no} AND se.screen_no = #{screen_name} ORDER BY res.seat_no ASC
